params.lastUnstakeId: Last unstake is to be claimed (if possible)

params._cooldown: Number of blocks after a user can claim an unstake

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._amount: Amount of cUSD tokens to stake

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._amount: number of tokens to be unstaked

params._newCooldown: Number of blocks after a user can claim an unstake

Claimed(address,uint256).notice: Triggered when some tokens have been claimed

ClaimedPartial(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Triggered when some tokens have been partially claimed

CooldownUpdated(uint256,uint256).notice: Triggered when the cooldown value has been updated

Staked(address,uint256).notice: Triggered when some tokens have been staked

Unstaked(address,uint256).notice: Triggered when some tokens have been unstaked

claim().notice: Claim all unstakes that are older than cooldown

initialize(address,address,address,uint2.notice: Used to initialize a new DonationMiner contract

stake(address,uint256).notice: Stakes new founds for the holder

stakeholdersListAt(uint256).notice: Returns the address of a stakeholder from stakeholdersList
